data.title: University of Ostrava [Acceptance Rate + Statistics]
data.meta_description: The University of Ostrava founded in 1991. Main academic topics: Biology, Liberal Arts & Social Sciences, and Computer Science.
data.meta_site_name: EduRank.org - Discover university rankings by location
data.text:
Quick Review

Funding

Public-private

partnership

Highest Degree

Bachelor

Languages

Czech

Acceptance rate

49%*

* The University of Ostrava is among the institutions that don't provide data on acceptance rates. This might happen because the university has programs where applicants only need to meet admission requirements to enroll and don't necessarily compete with others.

We estimate the above acceptance rate based on admission statistics of closely ranked nearby universities with similar research profiles that do publish such data.

Tuition

The tuition table for University of Ostrava gives an overview of costs but prices are approximate and subject to change and don't include accommodation, textbooks, or living expenses. The costs of programs might differ significantly for local and international students. The only source of truth for current numbers is the university's official website.

Program Tuition Cost (CZK) Academic Year Bachelor's Degree 60,000 2021-2022 Master's Degree 80,000 2021-2022 Doctoral Degree 100,000 2021-2022

The currency used is Czech Koruna (CZK).

Programs and Degrees

The table below displays academic fields with programs and courses that lead to Bachelor's, Master's, and Doctorate degrees offered by University of Ostrava.

Note that the table provides a general overview and might not cover all the specific majors available at the university. Always visit the university's website for the most up-to-date information on the programs offered.
